# Créer un paiement OFMS (Orange Money)

#### Orange Money (OFMS)
```bash
curl -X POST "https://api.icelabsoft.com/pay_services/api/add_payement" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "pAppName": "FAYCLICK",
    "pMethode": "OM",
    "pReference": "facture_002",
    "pClientTel": "777301221",
    "pMontant": 1000,
    "pServiceName": "OFMS",
    "pNomClient": "Prénom",
    "pPrenomClient": "Nom"
  }'
```
Format de réponse: 
{
    "uuid": "d27f0fb5-c342-4898-8211-0a9fc72770cb",
    "telephone": "777301221",
    "status": "PROCESSING",
    "service": "OFMS",
    "maxit": "https://sugu.orange-sonatel.com/mp/dmez7ijjUCbmUVPlsFx2",
    "om": "https://orange-money-prod-flowlinks.web.app/om/dmez7ijjUCbmUVPlsFx2",
    "payment_url": null,
    "qrCode": ""
}


# Créer un paiement INTOUCH (WAVE)
```bash
curl -X POST "https://api.icelabsoft.com/pay_services/api/add_payement" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "pAppName": "FAYCLICK",
    "pMethode": "WAVE",  # ou "OM" ou "FREE"
    "pReference": "facture_002",
    "pClientTel": "781043505",
    "pMontant": 1500,
    "pServiceName": "INTOUCH",
    "pNomClient": "Prénom",
    "pPrenomClient": "Nom"
  }'
```
Format de réponse:
{
    "uuid": "ec80faa8-e5dd-43cd-813c-8af3403a4ac2",
    "telephone": "781043505",
    "status": "PROCESSING",
    "service": "INTOUCH",
    "maxit": null,
    "om": null,
    "payment_url": "https://pay.wave.com/c/cos-1zsr8r4x01afr?a=1500&c=XOF&m=ICELABO%20SOFT%20%2A%20Into",
    "qrCode": "data:image/png;base64,"
}

Pour chacun des mode de paiement, on affichera le QrCode généré dans un nouveau modal qui affichera un timer de 1min20 décroissant 
permettant au client de pouvoir scanner et procéder à la validation du paiement via son mobile.
